for i in range(1):
    a,b,c,d = map(int,input().split())

result_1 = []
result_2 = []

if a <= b and c <= d:
    x = [a,b]
    
    y = [c,d]
    
    r1 = x[0]*y[0]
    r2 = x[0]*y[1]
    result_1.append(r1)
    result_1.append(r2)
    r3 = x[1]*y[0]
    r4 = x[1]*y[1]
    result_2.append(r3)
    result_2.append(r4)    
    
    x = max(result_1)
    y = max(result_2)
    result = max(x,y)

print(result)
